name: Wry Reveries
description:
Dive into the depths of legendary author Edgar Allan Poe's disturbing mind in this classically inspired point-and-click adventure game!

Travel back in time to the Victorian Era with its sophisticated socialites, misguided malpractices, and devastating diseases. All the while exploring a dreamscape full of mysteries, maladies, and of course, murder!  

  Game Features:

  • 13 adapted, retold, or reimagined classic stories and poems of Edgar Allan Poe
  • stream-lined interaction controls
  • logic puzzles
  • action puzzles
  • dark humor
  • branching solutions to many puzzles

The game will be broken-up between a prologue, 6 chapters, and an epilogue.  What is available currently is the prologue(demo). We hope to receive great feedback in order to improve the quality of the overall experience!
